definitions.definition: scratch or grope around with one's fingers to find, collect, or hold onto something.
examples: she scrabbled at the grassy slope, desperate for a firm grip
synonyms: scramble "they scrabbled around for the strewn coins"

definitions.definition: (of an animal) scratch at something with its claws.
examples: a dog was scrabbling at the door

definitions.definition: make great efforts to get somewhere or achieve something.
examples: I had to scrabble around to find this apartment

definitions.definition: an act of scratching or scrambling for something.
examples: he heard the scrabble of claws behind him

definitions.definition: a struggle to get somewhere or achieve something.
examples: a scrabble among the salesmen to avoid going to the bottom of the heap

definitions.definition: a board game in which players use lettered tiles to create words in a crossword fashion.
